command.default: Sends a queue message to a ROSEbot hardware device
command.details:
Devices: camera, speaker, relay, ...
Type:    Device Dependent
Type:    Device Dependent

Camera options: ...

config.default: Show config or set a config value
config.details: Shows all config values from config.json. If a key/value pair is provided, it will change that key to the new value.

prompt.default: Set a new ROSE Console command line prompt using text and placeholders

log.details:
list:   Shows a list of logs in the logs folder
delete: Delete logs in the logs folder
show:   Prints logs in the logs folder

exit.default: Stops the ROSEbot controller. Requires robot is currently stopped.
